scripts.init: npm install && prisma:generate && npm run build
scripts.full-reset: npm run clean && npm run init
scripts.clean: shx rm -rf apps/*/node_modules apps/*/dist libs/*/dist **/*.tsbuildinfo && shx rm -rf node_modules package-lock.json
scripts.dev: concurrently -n case,auth,gateway,client,ai,clients -c blue,green,magenta,yellow,cyan,white "npm run dev --workspace=apps/case-service" "npm run dev --workspace=apps/auth-service" "npm run dev --workspace=apps/gateway" "npm run dev --workspace=apps/client" "npm run dev --workspace=apps/ai-service" "npm run dev --workspace=apps/clients-service"
scripts.start: concurrently -n case,auth,gateway,client,ai,clients -c blue,green,magenta,yellow,cyan,white "npm run start --workspace=apps/case-service" "npm run start --workspace=apps/auth-service" "npm run start --workspace=apps/gateway" "npm run preview --workspace=apps/client" "npm run start --workspace=apps/ai-service" "npm run start --workspace=apps/clients-service"
